attributes.action: Is there a future for British made Biofuel?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British made biodiesel is manufactued using waste vegetable oil and Tallow.This is proven to be the most environmentall friendly biofuel type
Due to the failure of the Renewable fuel Transport order and that other EU countries operate a low or  no duty exemption on their Biofuel British manufacturers all over the country are closing. Why is there so much tax on British biofuel?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
